subject: Golf
Kraft Nabisco Championship (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Karrie Webb, a seven-time winner of major tournaments, has an encyclopedic knowledge of golf’s history and used some of her Founders Cup purse to help finance a film on the L.P.G.A.’s founders.
snippet: Karrie Webb, a seven-time winner of major tournaments, has an encyclopedic knowledge of golf’s history and used some of her Founders Cup purse to help finance a film on the L.P.G.A.’s founders.
